Posts.Content: willysuz wrote: I am in my 3rd week of taking Aromasin daily and am having horrile hip pain, wakes me up at about 430 or so in the morning, I've been taking a lortab just to get out of bed in the morning, and then treat the pain later in the day pain with Arthritis strength tylenol, I cant take Lortab later in the day or  wont sleep at night, anyone have any thoughts or experience with this.  This is the first I've taken pain meds in this whole journey..I'm not a fan of them .. is this pain normal, should I mention this to my oncologist now or wait until my next visit in a couple weeks.  I am also on Herceptin every 3 weeks.
